item.title: Health-Care Shortages: UK Doctors, US Nurses and Drugs Are In Low Supply
item.description: ![](news photo about health,care,shortages –ar 2:11.webp) Health-Care Shortages: UK Doctors, US Nurses and Drugs Are In Low Supply The global health-care system is facing a number of challenges, including shortages of doctors, nurses, and drugs. In the UK, there is a shortage of 100,000 doctors and 300,000 nurses.
